item.description:
New this month! Want to demo? Simply sign up on LaunchScale's site: 
http://launchscale.com/events/february-new-york-tech-meetup-simulcast/

Join a group of friends and fellow technologists to watch NY Tech Meetup live from the offices of Day Pitney in downtown Hartford! You'll have a chance to connect with our own Hartford entrepreneurial community while watching the demos at NYTM's monthly event.

Want more? Day Pitney is going to share some information about Connecticut Innovations Pre-seed fund!

Beer, Pizza, Demos & networking  before and after the livestream!  Tell your friends & fellow startups to come out and join us. We look forward to seeing everyone.

Tuesday February 5th, 6:00 pm

Day Pitney LLP
242 Trumbull Street
Hartford, CT 06103

6th Floor - Tell security that you are attending the LaunchScale event at Day Pitney

Price:  FREE
item.how_to_find_us: 6th Floor - Tell security that you are attending the LaunchScale event at Day Pitney
item.name: LaunchScale: NY Tech Meetup Simulcast (February)
